name: Cheese Pizza
steps: Place Pizza Steel (or Stone if you don't have steel) in oven
Let Pizza Steel heat for 1 hour
Dust Cornmeal on a Pizza Peel
Take cold dough out of the fridge
Dust dough in flour before stretching (and a bit mid-stretch)
Place stretched dough on Cornmealed Pizza Peel
Top with just enough Sauce to lightly coat the surface
Sprinkle Parmesan over Sauce, then Mozzarella over Parmesan
Shimmy Pizza Peel a bit to ensure the Pizza isn't stuck
Slide Pizza onto the Pizza Steel
Let cook for ~6 minutes (until cheese starts to brown)
Pull Pizza out with tongs onto a cooling grate
Transfer to serving plate after cooling for like 3 minutes
